title: Put Some Sauce On That Ball
description:
Think you can’t get June and Jessica to cry while talking about…sports?! Think again, Deep Divers! This week, the gals live out June’s Hoop Dream and dig into what it means to “use your body,” overly aggressive teammates and why their fathers thought it was appropriate to quote their basketball stats in their wedding speeches. Finally, Jessica relives a 7th grade crush on the captain of the soccer team gone horribly, horribly wrong. Names in this podcast have been changed and altered to protect the innocent.

You can follow The Deep Dive on Twitter @thedeepdivepod

June Diane Raphael @MsJuneDiane on Twitter @junediane on Instagram

Jessica St. Clair @Jessica_StClair on Twitter @stclairjessica on Instagram

Check out the Jane Club at www.janeclub.com

Send us your The Deep Dive theme or any questions you might have to thedeepdive@earwolf.com
author: thedeepdive@earwolf.com (June Diane Rapheal, Earwolf & Jessica St. Clair)
